TopicTitle: Unable to unlock technology in Career

Articles.Content:
Hi, I seem to be having trouble unlocking anything on the technology-three for some reason. Where is the Blue 'unlock' button?

I have the 24.2.559 version on the Mac, with:

Chatterer

EnhancedNavBall

KWRocketry

MechJeb2

NothkeSerCom
It appears your resolution is too low for it to be displayed. What resolution are you running KSP at?
I'm running this on my TV, so 1280x720. (It's currently the only resolution available to chose.)
